Hi..I would like to use Cantera to study air_Methane combustion with 1
step=
 mechanisme; i.e.    CH4 + 2 O2 =3D> CO2 + 2 H2O .
The progress rate Q is: =
Q =3D Kf  Prod_{k=3D1}^{N} | X k | ^nk'
- Kr  Prod_{k=3D1}^{N} | X k | ^nk'=
'
where Kf e Kr are the forward and reverse rates of reaction, n is the
num=
ber of species, | X k | are the molar concentrations. The forward
rate of r=
eaction is modeled using the Arrhenius law and modifing the
.cti file. But =
I can't find how to set with Cantera the values of nk'
and nk'' and the num=
ber of Schimdt for each species. Is it possible  to
work with 1/2 step mech=
anisme??

Thanks for your attention,
Benedetta
